title: About Me
subtitle: My Personal Journey
description: I am a web developer and an engineering student. In my free time, I practice calisthenics and also make room for video games.
description2: Throughout my professional and student career, one of my passions has been solving problems and helping users through well-thought-out and functional technological solutions. I believe the key is to empathize with the needs of the end user and transform those needs into digital experiences that truly make a difference.
